articles.title: Session of UN Committee on Relations with Host Country Blames U.S. Extortion of DPRK's Diplomatic Package
articles.content:
ession of UN Committee on Relations with Host Country Blames U.S. Extortion of DPRK's Diplomatic Package
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A session of the UN Committee on Relations with Host Country was held at the UN headquarters on July 13 at the request of the permanent mission of the DPRK at the UN.
					 Discussed at the session was the case of extortion of an official diplomatic package of the DPRK mission by the U.S.
					
					 The councilor of the DPRK mission explained the circumstances of the extortion of the diplomatic package by the U.S., denouncing it as an intolerable encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and a hideous provocation in breach of international law.
					
					 Stressing that diplomatic packages are entitled to inviolability and protection under the Article 27 of the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations, he continued:
					
					 The U.S. State Department allegedly expressed an official apology right after the occurrence of the case, but it has so far delayed the return of the package under this or that pretext.
					
					 The U.S. gangster-like act of provocation proves to what extent the U.S. policy of hostility toward the DPRK has reached. It also fully reveals the arrogance and the shamelessness of the U.S. going reckless in utter disregard of international law.
					
					 He emphasized that the Committee is obliged to hold the U.S. authorities liable for the recent incident of grave severity and consequences, and urged the U.S. to return the package immediately and unconditionally. He also called for practical steps so that there would not be any more violation of sovereignty of the UN member nations.
					
					 The Cyprian mission at the U.N., chair of the Committee, and many other missions represented at the session including those from China, Russia, Cuba, Iran and Syria, denounced the U.S. extortion of the DPRK's diplomatic package as a serious and never-to-be-condoned act.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to make an official apology for encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and return the package immediately as demanded by the DPRK side. And they stressed that the U.S. should respect the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations, ensure the personal safety of all the delegations visiting the U.S. to take part in the UN conferences and respect the inviolable right of diplomatic packages.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threats and Blackmail to DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threats and Blackmail to DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Pan-Korean Emergency Measure Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills against the DPRK made public a statement on Saturday denouncing the U.S. nuclear threats and blackmail to the DPRK on the lapse of 60 years since the official announcement of arming the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea with nuclear weapons.
					 The statement said that on July 15, 1957, the U.S. declared that it started arming the U.S. aggressor forces in south Korea with nuclear weapons and massively introduced nukes into south Korea and on January 29, 1958 officially announced the deployment of the nuclear weapons in south Korea.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In the subsequent period, the U.S. turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear advanced base in the Far East whose number reached more than 1 720 in the middle of the 1980s.
					
					 In the new century the U.S. listed the DPRK as part of "axis of evil" and the target of nuclear preemptive attack and steadily developed scenarios for invasion of the DPRK such as OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5015, ceaselessly posing nuclear threats and blackmail to the DPRK.
					
					 There is no other country in the world than the DPRK which has been exposed to the persistent and toughest nuclear threats from the U.S. for a long period since the 1950s.
					
					 It is very just that the DPRK possessed nuclear deterrence for self-defence and has steadily strengthened it in every way to protect dignity and sovereignty of the nation to cope with the arbitrary nuclear threats from the U.S.
					
					 The strategic position of the DPRK and the world political structure has radically changed and gone are the days never to return when the U.S. used to impose threats and blackmail to the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should drop at once the disgraceful policy of sycophancy toward outside forces and confrontation with the compatriots, bearing in mind that taking advantages of the U.S. moves is an act of treachery little short of leaving the interests and destiny of the nation to the tender mercy of outside forces.

articles.title: "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Is Intolerable
articles.content:
"Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Is Intolerable
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims issued a statement Saturday over the fact that the demand for annulment of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, a product of the treachery by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and the height of its sycophancy toward Japan, is growing in south Korea.
					 The "agreement" on the sexual slavery which the Park Geun Hye group finalized with the Abe group of Japan during its tenure is an unprecedented disgraceful document of treachery in which the Park group agreed to shield the hideous crime committed by the Japanese imperialists in return for just a few penny of money without wresting any apology, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The sexual slavery issue, a hideous crime against humanity which inflicted intolerable insult and unspeakable harm to the Korean nation, is not an issue that can be solved through "renegotiations" or "diplomatic agreement".
					
					 This is an issue of removing sycophancy and submission deeply rooted and inherent in the south Korean society, and retaking the independent dignity of the nation.
					
					 There can never be enough compensation for the mental and physical pain done to the Korean nation by the Japanese imperialist aggressors and the ruinous life led by the victims of sexual slavery.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries are still lording it over as a colonial suzerain state, extremely looking down upon the south Koreans, far from repenting of the past crimes. They say that "comfort women agreement is final and irreversible" and "there will be no more apology from Japan over the comfort women issue".
					
					 What is all the more serious is that the south Korean authorities are still resorting to the despicable act of treachery of selling off the dignity and interests of the nation while talking about "improved relations with Japan" and "future orientation" and covering up the heinous crimes committed against the Korean nation including the women.
					
					 The statement stressed that if the south Korean authorities are shamefully played into the hands of tricky and brazen-faced Japan, while submitting to Japan, in defiance of the nation's desire, they will leave shameful crime before the nation.

articles.title: Support to Struggle of Jongyojo in S. Korea Expressed
articles.content:
Support to Struggle of Jongyojo in S. Korea Expressed
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) forcibly outlawed by the conservative group of traitors is waging a fiercer struggle for its legalization with the positive support of various circles.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the Central Committee of the Educational and Cultural Workers' Union of Korea issued a statement on Saturday, expressing support and solidarity for the just struggle of Jongyojo to liquidate the evils of the sycophantic and fascist dictatorship, achieve justice of society and democracy and retake the legitimate right.
					
					 Noting that Jongyojo has waged a dynamic struggle to oppose the puppet authorities' reactionary education policy and implant the correct view on history and conscience of reunification into the minds of the youth and schoolchildren while calling for democracy of education, improvement of educational environment and education in reunification, the statement said:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye conservative groups, which regarded Jongyojo as a thorn in their flesh, not only checked its just educational activities and movement for democracy but also cracked down it in every way. Park Geun Hye, a descendant of the ill-famed "yusin" fascist dictator, finally outlawed Jongyojo.
					
					 In face of the dynamic struggle of Jongyojo and pressure of the public, the present chief executive of south Korea pledged himself to legitimate it during the "presidential" election. But today he turned a deaf ear to it in fact, sparking off the public resentment.
					
					 Therefore, various circles of south Korea are extending positive support to the righteous activities of Jongyojo for independence and democracy of society and joining in the struggle for its legalization.
					
					 The just struggle of Jongyojo will surely emerge victorious as it has turned out in a campaign for the social change in south Korea and the future of the nation, aware of mission and duty of educators.

articles.title: Mexican Party Delegation Departs
articles.content:
Mexican Party Delegation Departs
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Ricardo Cantu Garza, coordinator of its National Coordinating Committee, left here to return home.

articles.title: Improvement of Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway Ends
articles.content:
Improvement of Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway Ends
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The improvement of Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway was successfully completed in the DPRK.
					 According to an official concerned, with the improvement of 150 km-long waterway, it came to be possible to supply water to over 20 reservoirs and Lake Thaesong.
					
					 The waterway is a gravity-fed irrigation system which irrigates croplands in South Phyongan Province and Pyongyang and Nampho cities and supplies water to industrial establishments in those regions.
					
					 People and servicepersons in South Phyongan Province have turned out as one in the campaign for improving the water-way and finished the project in a short span of time.

articles.title: Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
e071512 - Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK is taking the lead in raising the standard of education.
					 Last year, the college made greater achievements in putting the education on a practical, comprehensive and modern basis, adhering to the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea in education and encouraged theoretical explanation in plain words.
					
					In recent months alone, it updated over 39,000 teaching plans and markedly raised the proportion of visual aid in education by applying more e-teaching programs based on multimedia. And it also invented and introduced hundreds of advantageous teaching methods.
					
					 After establishing a system for video meeting among medical universities across the country, it popularizes achievements and experience gained by them and disseminates ultramodern medical technologies, reference books, software, etc. throughout the country.

articles.title: Trump Should Behave with Reason: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Trump Should Behave with Reason: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Trump administration is going reckless, talking about "global action" against the DPRK over its successful ICBM Hwasong-14 test-launch.
					 Terming the test a "threat to the world" and crying out for "deadly counteraction" and "maximum pressure", it seeks to maximize the international sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 At a joint press conference with the Polish president on July 6 Trump called on all countries to "strongly react to the very big threat from north Korea." He urged the world to "make north Korea realize that bad consequences would entail its awful deed."
					
					 Sebastian Gorka, deputy assistant to Trump, when interviewed by a journalist of the on-line newspaper Breitbart News Daily on July 7, asserted that the U.S. is letting all its friendly, allied and colleague countries put collective pressure on north Korea, answering the question as to what the U.S. can do diplomatically against north Korea at present.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson recently stated that the U.S. will never accept the DPRK which had access to nukes. An official spokesman for Pentagon in a press conference said that the U.S. will never stop its military drills near the Korean peninsula.
					
					 To talk about "global action" accusing a sovereign state's entirely just self-defensive option is just a vivid manifestation of the Trump-style strong-arm policy designed to seek the U.S. interests by sacrificing others.
					
					 This is just a last-ditch effort of those who have lost their temper, stunned by the strategic position of the DPRK which has been put on a new higher level.
					
					 The U.S. brigandish attempt to mobilize the whole world to the campaign against an independent sovereign country for the reason that it incurs its disfavor can never work on today's world.
					
					 The successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 has helped remarkably increase the nuclear capability of the DPRK as a war deterrent and more creditably preserve peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged a world-class nuclear and rocket power.
					
					 The U.S. should acknowledge the fact that the DPRK will never put its nukes and ballistic rocket on the table of negotiations unless the U.S. terminates its hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK and dialogue discussing the DPRK's dismantlement of nukes can never happen.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. works to break the DPRK's remarkably increased power and strategic position through sanctions and pressure, the more frequently the DPRK will send big and small "gift packages" to the U.S.
					
					 The Trump administration had better behave with reason, though belatedly.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked 
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 31st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea". 
					 The work, published on July 15, Juche 75 (1986), serves as an immortal programme to be held fast to in accomplishing the Korean revolution to the last under the banner of Juche.
					
					 The period since the publication of the work is the proud history during which the political and ideological might of the Korean revolution has been rapidly strengthened through the education of the Juche idea and the validity and invincibility of the cause of Korean-style socialism have been clearly proved, the article says, adding:
					
					 Under the worst situation in which others might have collapsed a hundred times, the DPRK has turned into a political and ideological power, military power and dignified Paektusan youth power and displayed the great revolutionary spirit  and made a leap forward and innovations across the country. This is the results of the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea which has dynamically conducted the work for modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea on the basis of the Juche idea.
					
					 The road of Juche is the ever-victorious advance of the Korean revolution and the people's best power is the country which thoroughly embodies the requirements of the Juche idea.
					
					 It is the precious truth taught by the practical struggle in the past period that the road of accelerating the final victory of building a powerful socialist country is to consistently conduct the education of the Juche idea and steadily strengthen the ideological work.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Opt for Repairing Relations with North: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Opt for Repairing Relations with North: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea made public his "conception of peace on the Korean peninsula" during his recent junket to Germany.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 His "peace conception" seemed fortunate as he pledged to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, unlike his predecessors' stance.
					
					 However, its overall contents are run through with an ill intention to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north and stifle them with the backing of outsiders. They are all characterized by nonsensical sophism putting a brake on the efforts for achieving peace on the Korean peninsula and repairing the north-south relations.
					
					 As the present chief executive of south Korea uttered, proper beginning is important for everything.
					
					 In order to fundamentally improve, as desired by the fellow countrymen, the north-south relations complicated and twisted by festering distrust and antagonism, hostility and confrontation under the pro-U.S. conservative regime, and achieve peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula, it is important to make a good start.
					
					 It is necessary to do something badly needed and settle the fundamental issue above all at the starting point.
					
					 The intention of all Koreans and aspiration of candlelight demonstrators can never come true if the south Korean regime persists in reading the face of the U.S. displeasing the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation and the pro-U.S. conservative forces desperately checking the improved north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not persistently depend on outsiders, going against the aspiration of all Koreans and the trend of the times, but opt for improving the north-south relations and achieving independent reunification by pooling efforts with the compatriots in the north.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Military Scheme to Strike at DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Military Scheme to Strike at DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. Defense Department loudly advertised that it shaped a scenario of military attack as instructed by Trump to work out various plans to cope with "provocations" by the DPRK.
					 Trump openly revealed his intention to mount military strike at the DPRK, claiming that the "time of strategic patience with it is over" and the "U.S. has a very strong and definite scenario."
					
					 The U.S. war-thirsty forces announced that if the DPRK take a strategic measure, a plan of military attack will be immediately presented to Trump.
					
					 The U.S., scared at the DPRK's great success in its test-fire of ICBM, is further escalating the situation while staging a joint ballistic missile drill with the south Korean warmongers.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Saturday ridicules the U.S. intention of striking at the DPRK as a very foolish act of precipitating its self-ruin.
					
					 Stressing that the army and people of the DPRK are fully ready to counter any military option chosen by the U.S., the daily warns:
					
					 If a war breaks out in Korea owing to the U.S. unpardonable act, the empire of America will meet a shameful end.
					
					 If the U.S. wants to escape the worst disaster in its history, it should behave itself, clearly aware of the strategic position of Juche Korea, though belatedly.

articles.title: Violence against No-THAAD Action Participants in S. Korea
articles.content:
Violence against No-THAAD Action Participants in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The puppet police of south Korea committed violence against civilians participating in the no-THAAD action in Sosong-ri, Chojon-myon of Songju County in North Kyongsang Province to spark uproar of south Koreans on July 12, according to the Yonhap News.
					 More than 1,300 policemen forcefully detained in the hall of the village residents of Songju County who turned out in the action banning trucks of puppet army going to the THAAD deployment site, and surrounded the residents blocking the road.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Demands Hike of Minimum Wage
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Demands Hike of Minimum Wage
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on July 12 carried an editorial demanding that the present "government" of south Korea accept the draft for increasing the minimum wage suggested by the workers.
					 The editorial stressed that the present ruler who dedicated tens of trillions of won to the U.S. which were to be spent for the people is the same as traitor Lee Myung Bak who wasted a huge amount of money for the four river projects which had been regarded as impossible.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Chief Executive of Diplomacy Servile to U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Chief Executive of Diplomacy Servile to U.S.
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo carried an editorial accusing the chief executive on July 13.
					 The editorial referred to the chief executive's diplomacy servile to the U.S. during his junket to America.
					
					 It accused him of saying that "he will simultaneously push forward dialogue and sanctions in the north-south relations" in Germany, shocking and disappointing compatriots.

articles.title: Inspection of Process of THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Inspection of Process of THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Residents and Won Buddhists in Songju County and Kimchon City of North Kyongsang Province and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference outside the Board of Audit and Inspection in Seoul on July 12, urging the inspection of the whole process of THAAD deployment.
					 They handed over the bill demanding inspection of the process to the Board of Audit and Inspection, according to the south Korean on-line paper Tongil News.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Realize the Country's Reunification Independently through the United Effort" was brought out in booklet by the Azzawi Media Print Publishing House in Berlin on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on August 19, Juche 81 (1992), indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the ways for achieving the unity of the entire nation.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 4.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on President Kim Il Sung's exploits took place in various countries on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 They were held by the Diversity Party of Indonesia, Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, Lahore Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Pakistan, Ugandan National Executive Committee of the PanÔºçAfrican Movement and branch groups under the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism from June 25 to July 4.
					
					 The chairman and the secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia praised Kim Il Sung as the close friend of the Indonesian people who provided the foundation for the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years founded the immortal Juche idea and victoriously advanced the revolution and construction on its basis.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Lahore Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Pakistan said that Kim Il Sung's exploits for strengthening socialist Korea and accomplishing the human cause of independence will shine long with the century.
					
					 Figures of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement lauded Kim Il Sung for positively helping the people of the developing countries dynamically push forward the building of a new society under the uplifted banner of independence.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Observed in Iran
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Observed in Iran
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Iranian news Ilna on July 9 reported that the test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 conducted by the DPRK has rocked the world.
					 It explained what meaning the said Hwasong-14 conveyed to the international community, soon after the test-launch of the ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 happened in May, as follows:
					
					 First, the meaning concludes the entity and strategic position took on by the DPRK as a nuclear power in the East, which is undeniable.
					
					 Second, any sorts of sanctions and pressure by the U.S. won't work on the DPRK and the former can never check the advance of the latter.
					
					 Third, the Hwasong-14 is a solemn declaration predicting the final end of the U.S. ambition for world domination.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons of justice will not allow the U.S. to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula but will firmly protect peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The truth that a genuine peace rests on nukes of justice has been instilled into humankind after the successful test-launch of Hwasong-14.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Russian website Irkutskblogspot. Ru carried the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Bring the Advantages of Socialism in Our Country into Full Play" on July 5 to mark the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on May 24, Juche 79 (1990), comprehensively deals with the essence and basic features of Korean-style socialism guided by the Juche idea and its invincibility and advantages.
					
					 It also refers to the tasks facing for giving fullest play to the advantages of Korean socialism, implementing the new 5-point policy for national reunification and consistently realizing the country's foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship under the uplifted banner of socialism.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion del comite de relaciones con el pais sede de la ONU
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion del comite de relaciones con el pais sede de la ONU
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- A propuesta de la Representacion Permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU, tuvo lugar el dia 13 en la sede de la ONU la reunion del comite de relaciones con el pais sede.
					  En la ocasion fue debatido el incidente de extorsion de la valija diplomatica de la Representacion Permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU por parte de EE.UU.
					
					  El consejero de la mision coreana explico las circunstancias del incidente y lo denuncio como imperdonable atentado contra la soberania de la RPDC y brutal provocacion que viola el derecho internacional.
					
					  El dijo que segun el articulo 27 de la Convencion de Viena sobre las relaciones diplomaticas, las valijas diplomaticas tienen la inviolabilidad y el derecho a proteccion, y prosiguio.
					
					  Aunque poco despues del incidente, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. dijo que pide disculpas oficialmente, dilata todavia la devolucion de la valija diplomatica bajo diferentes pretextos.
					
					  El presente acto provocativo de EE.UU. comprueba a que grado llega su politica hostil anti-RPDC y demuestra claramente a todo el mundo la arrogancia y el cinismo de ese pais que actua groseramente sin tomar en consideracion ni la ley internacional.
					
					  El comite de relaciones con el pais sede debe inquirir a EE.UU. la gravedad del incidente y la responsabilidad de su consecuencia.
					
					EE.UU. debe devolver incondicional e inmediatamente la valija diplomatica usurpada y tomar medidas practicas para que no se repita tal atentado contra la soberania de un pais miembro de la ONU.
					
					  El representante de Chipre ante la ONU, quien es presidente de la reunion del comite de relaciones con el pais sede, y los otros de muchos paises participantes en la ocasion, inclusive China, Rusia, Cuba, Iran y Siria condenaron como acto grave e imperdonable la extorsion de valija diplomatica de la RPDC.
					
					  Y senalaron que como demanda la parte coreana, EE.UU. debe pedir disculpas oficialmente por su acto violador de la soberania y devolver inmediatamente la valija diplomatica de la RPDC.
					
					Igualmente, tiene que observar la Convencion de Viena y respetar la inviolabilidad sobre la seguridad personal de todas las delegaciones, que vienen a EE.UU. a participar en las reuniones de la ONU, y sobre la valija diplomatica, demandaron.

articles.title: Encargado de negocios de Suecia realiza visita consular a Rim Hyon Su
articles.content:
Encargado de negocios de Suecia realiza visita consular a Rim Hyon Su
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El encargado de negocios a.i. de Suecia en Corea realizo el dia 14 una visita consular al ciudadano canadiense Rim Hyon Su quien esta cumpliendo la pena que le fue dictada en diciembre de 2015 por sus actos hostiles anti-RPDC.
					Rim hablo al diplomatico sueco sobre el estado de su salud y le encomendo que trasladara al gobierno canadiense su solicitud de que ponga en funcion los mejores esfuerzos por la solucion de su problema.
					
					Sobre la base de la Convencion de Viena relativa a las relaciones consulares y del espiritu humanitario, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea permite la visita consular a Rim Hyon Su por parte de la embajada sueca en Corea que se encarga de la proteccion consular a los ciudadanos canadienses en Corea.

articles.title: CPME denuncia amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
articles.content:
CPME denuncia amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se cumplen 60 anos desde cuando EE.UU. anunciara oficialmente el armamento nuclear de sus tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion para revelar y condenar la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun el documento, el 15 de julio de 1957, EE.UU. anuncio el comienzo del armamento nuclear de sus tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea e introdujo gran cantidad de artefactos nucleares.
					
					El 29 de enero del ano siguiente, anuncio oficialmente el despliegue de sus armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Posteriormente, no dejo de introducir los mismos armamentos de diferentes tipos, de modo que hasta mediados de la decada de 1980, el suelo surcoreano se convirtiera en la base avanzada nuclear mas grande del Extremo Oriente donde fueron distribuidas mas de mil 720 armas nucleares, recuerda el documento y continua:
					
					En los albores del nuevo siglo, el imperio americano definio a la RPDC como "eje del mal" y blanco de golpe preventivo nuclear y enmendo constantemente el "OPLAN 5027", el "OPLAN 5015" y otros guiones de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					En este mundo no hay otro pais como la RPDC que durante largo tiempo desde la decada de 1950, vive sometida a la amenaza nuclear mas obstinada e intensa de EE.UU.
					
					Es del todo justo que la RPDC haya preparado y consolidado por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para defender la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del pais frente a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					Se cambiaron radicalmente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la estructura de politica mundial y paso una vez por todas el tiempo en que el imperio amenazaba y chantajeaba unilateralmente a la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar ahora mismo sus actos sumisos a las fuerzas extranjeras y conflictivos con la parte connacional teniendo presente que sumarse a las maniobras de EE.UU. es el acto traidor de confiar los intereses y el destino de la nacion en las fuerzas foraneas.

articles.title: No sera tolerado jamas el "acuerdo" Sudcorea-Japon en problema de esclava sexual
articles.content:
No sera tolerado jamas el "acuerdo" Sudcorea-Japon en problema de esclava sexual
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por las Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion en relacion con que en estos dias se torna mas fuerte en el Sur de Corea la demanda de la anulacion del "acuerdo" sobre el problema de esclavitud sexual para el ex ejercito japones, producto del crimen antinacional cometido por la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye y climax de sus actos vendepatrias projaponeses.
					El "acuerdo", inventado por la banda de Park Geun-hye durante su mandato con la pandilla de Abe, es el documento humillante y vendepatria que prometio en secreto indultar el crimen de esclavitud sexual cometido por el imperialismo japones a cambio de un dinero insignificante que pagaria Japon sin ninguna disculpa, comienza el documento y continua:
					
					El asunto de esclavitud sexual es el inaudito crimen antietico, que impuso a la nacion coreana la el intolerable insulto e indecibles sufrimientos, razon por la cual su solucion no puede ser solucionado con las "renegociaciones" o el "acuerdo diplomatico".
					
					Este problema no es el asunto simple para liquidar los vicios dejados por Park Geun-hye, sino el trabajo para erradicar el habito cronico de la sociedad surcoreana obligante a las grandes potencias y rescatar la dignidad independiente de la nacion.
					
					Nunca se pueden reparar ni recompensar los dolores mentales y fisicos de la nacion coreana sufridos por culpa de los agresores japoneses y la vida frustrada de las victimas de esclavitud sexual.
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses disparatean que "el problema de consoladoras fue resuelto de manera definitiva e irreversible" y "Japon no pedira mas disculpas por ese tema". Y siguen actuando como metropoli despreciando extremadamente a la poblacion surcoreana, en vez de reflexionar de sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que las autoridades surcoreanas recurren a los actos malos de vender la dignidad y los intereses nacionales bajo el pretexto del "desarrollo de relaciones" con Japon, enemigo jurado, y la "aspiracion al futuro" dejando a un lado los crimenes escalofriantes de los imperialistas japoneses cometidos contra las mujeres coreanas y toda la nacion.
					
					Si ellas persiguen la vil politica de sumision a Japon dando espalda a la demanda de toda la nacion y actuan de acuerdo con las descaradas artimanas del pais isleno, dejaran el vergonzoso expediente criminal ante la nacion

articles.title: Vocero de CC de USECC se solidariza con la lucha justa de SNE de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Vocero de CC de USECC se solidariza con la lucha justa de SNE de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ACNC) -- Se dinamiza cada dia mas bajo el apoyo activo de las amplias masas la lucha por obtener la legalizacion del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes (SNE) del Sur de Corea que se ilegalizo por fuerza por la banda conservadora y traidora.
					El portavoz del Comite Central de la Union Sindical de Educacion y Cultura de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion enviando apoyo y solidaridad a la justa lucha del SNE por eliminar tajantemente el malo de la dictadura servil a grandes potencias, vendepatria y fascista, por realizar la justicia y democracia de la sociedad y por recuperar el derecho legal.
					
					El SNE, entidad defensora de los derechos de los profesores y los empleados de las escuelas primarias, secundarias y superiores del Sur de Corea, vino luchando sin parar contra la politica de ensenanza reaccionaria de las autoridades surcoreanas y por educar a los jovenes y ninos en la concepcion correcta a la historia y conciencia de reunificacion, insistiendo en la democratizacion de la ensenanza, la mejora del ambiente educativo y el fortalecimiento de educacion de la reunificacion, senala la misiva y prosigue:
					
					Las bandas conservadoras de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye, quienes consideraban esa entidad como una espina en sus ojos, impidieron y reprimieron las justas actividades de ensenanza y el movimiento de democratizacion de la entidad y la descendiente del dictador fascista de "Yusin", Park Geun-hye, ilegalizo al fin y al cabo a esa entidad como una "entidad sindical ilegal".
					
					Doblegandose a la fuerte lucha del SNE y la presion social,  el actual mandatario surcoreano prometio en las "elecciones presidenciales" la legalizacion de la entidad, pero, no cumple su promesa, causando la indignacion de todas las poblaciones surcoreanas.
					
					Por lo tanto, las amplias masas surcoreanas envian el apoyo activo a las actividades justas del SNE que exigen la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad, y se unen a la lucha por la legalizacion de la entidad.
					
					Saldra sin falta victoriosa la lucha justa del SNE, levantado con audacia por la reforma social en el Sur de Corea y el porvenir de la nacion, siendo consciente de la mision y deber del educador.
